title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 122: Featuring Taylor Hall, Johnny Walker and Tyler Busch
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by NHL MVP Taylor Hall. The guys talk about Taylor's time in New Jersey, winning the Hart Trophy, living with Whit and more. The guys are also joined by Johnny Walker and Tyler Busch of the Arizona State Men's Hockey Team. The boys talk about what it's like to play at a school like ASU, playing with Mario Lemieux's kid, and the future of the Sun Devils program.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
